org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class OldAutomatonCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.io.OldAutomatonCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OldAltAutomatonCodec, OldFSACodec, OldGameCodec

    public abstract class OldAutomatonCodec
extends XMLCodec
    An OldAutomatonCodec provides methods for encoding an automaton in old GOAL file format (GFF) and decoding an old GFF file back to an automaton.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public abstract java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the type of the automaton to be encoded or decoded. The type will appear in the GFF file as an attribute of the root element.
        Returns:
        the unique type name of the automaton to be encoded or decoded

                                Editable obj,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> excludes)
                         throws CodecException
        Decodes other properties of an editable object from an XML element.
        Parameters:
        e - an XML element
        obj - an editable object
        excludes - built-in properties that should be excluded
        Throws:
        CodecException - if e is not well-formed

      • decodeStateIDSet

        protected State[] decodeStateIDSet(Automaton aut,
                                   org.w3c.dom.NodeList states)
                            throws CodecException
        Decodes a NodeList as a set of state IDs and returns the states with that IDs in the automaton to be decoded.
        Parameters:
        aut - the automaton to be decoded
        states - a NodeList representing a set of state IDs
        Returns:
        the states with IDs represented by states in aut
        Throws:
        CodecException - if some state cannot be found in aut

      • encodeStateIDSet

        protected org.w3c.dom.Element[] encodeStateIDSet(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                 State[] states)
        Encodes a set of states as a set of XML elements. Each element represents the ID of the corresponding state.
        Parameters:
        doc - the XML document
        states - states to be encoded
        Returns:
        XML elements corresponding to state IDs of states

        Parameters:
        doc - the XML document
        trans - transitions to be encoded
        Returns:

      • decodeTransition

        public Transition decodeTransition(org.w3c.dom.Element e,
                                   Automaton aut)
                            throws CodecException
        Decodes an XML element as a transition.
        Parameters:
        e - an XML element to be decoded
        aut - the automaton corresponding to the GFF file to be decoded
        Returns:
        the transition in aut represented by e
        Throws:
        CodecException - if the tag name or the tid attribute is invalid, or the source state or the destination state cannot be found in aut

        aut - the automaton represented by the GFF file to be decoded
        Returns:
        the acceptance condition represented by e
        Throws:
        CodecException - if the tag name or type attribute is invalid, or the states or the transitions in the acceptance condition cannot be found in aut
